actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide economic incentives for the preservation of open space and conservation of natural resources, and for other purposes.
short_title: Paul Coverdell Homestead Open Space Preservation and Conservation Act of 2003

summary.text: Paul Coverdell Homestead Open Space Preservation and Conservation Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited tax credit, in the case of a qualified conservation organization, in the amount of the taxpayer's qualified conservation expenditures.

titles.title: Paul Coverdell Homestead Open Space Preservation and Conservation Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide economic incentives for the preservation of open space and conservation of natural resources, and for other purposes.
